value.value:
A high-performance assault rifle (auto rifle).

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

At the moment being fired, the bullet's power is the maximum of the spec (Damage value shown on the right).

Its power will gradually decrease and become the minimum of the spec (Damage value shown on the right) when reaching its limit of the range.

An upgraded version of the PA-11. The basic performance is somewhat improved. A laser sight is attached.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Laser sight is a device sending out a linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed. (Laser beam is only light without attack power.)

The beam can also be used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

A special rifle developed to battle against powered exoskeletons. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stagesâ€”hitting the target and the explosion that follows.

The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damages. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

A new assault rifle that emphasizes on its destructive power. In exchange for the intensified power, the accuracy drops sharply and it takes longer to reload.

Although a huge budget was put into the development of this weapon with the expectation to surpass PA-11, the outcome wasn't satisfying.
This development project was frozen and left with only this prototype.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A semi-auto rifle with outstanding destructive power. It can fire the special large AP bullets. Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

A new assault rifle with excellent rapid fire performance. Because its bullets are lightweight, its firepower is inferior to the PA-11; however, the rate of fire can be doubled. Its overall firepower is fairly high.
Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the PA-11 LS. Its basic performance is somewhat improved. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope. You can use the scope with the Zoom/Activate button.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

Laser sight is a device sending out a linear laser beam. Since the laser beam is visible with naked eyes, the landing location can be confirmed. (Laser beam is only light without attack power.)

The beam can also be used to determine whether the target is within range. If there's a red spot while aiming at the target, it means that object is %dq%in range.%dq%

The next generation assault rifle which has been newly developed after the Slugger project being called off. Although it's still in the prototype stage, it already exceeds the performance of the PA-11. Due to the complex structure, it takes more time to reload.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the G&M-21S with various performances improved. A scope is attached.

A semi-auto rifle with outstanding destructive power. It can fire the special large AP bullets. Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

The burst-shooting version of the Minion Buster. Pulling the trigger (pressing the attack button) will consecutively fire three armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stagesâ€”hitting the target and the explosion that follows.

The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damages. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

An upgraded version of the M1 Raven. In order to make a good use of its improved accuracy, a laser sight is added.

An assault rifle with excellent rapid fire performance. Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the next generation assault rifle T1 Stork. Its performance has become stable after repeated adjustments. In order to make a good use of its upgraded accuracy, a scope is added. In addition, the power reduction due to air resistance has been somewhat improved.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An improved weapon developed from the G&M-22S. Its destructive power is greatly boosted. The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

An upgraded version of the next generation assault rifle T1 Stork. A laser sight is attached and various performances are boosted. The loading mechanism is also improved to shorten the reload time.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the Minion Buster with various performances improved. The effective range also greatly increases.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stagesâ€”hitting the target and the explosion that follows.

The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damages. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

The new Raven assault rifle. Its rate of fire is much better than the M1 type. However, in exchange for this amazing rapid fire, its accuracy is sacrificed a bit.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The new type of the next generation assault rifle Stork. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope. It has a better accuracy compared with T1 Stork.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A new assault rifle emphasizing on its destructive power. In exchange for a devastating destructive power, all other performances are sacrificed.

Project of the assault rifle Slugger has been frozen, but it was reopened later and thus this whole new prototype was born.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the T2 Stork with various performances improved. Because the bullets are improved and thus the power reduction due to air resistance is successfully improved as well. It's equipped with laser sight and scope.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The powered-up M2 Raven with stable performance and improved accuracy.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the G&M-A23. Various performances are improved and a laser sight is attached.

The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit. The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The powered-up M2R Raven. The Raven assault rifle is with too high of a rapid fire performance that its bullets run out fast within a short time. Therefore, its magazines are improved for a higher capacity. Equipped with a scope.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An improved weapon developed from the T2 Stork. Its basic structure has been changed greatly and thus dramatically improves the performance; however it's difficult to adjust the weapon stats. Therefore it's still unstable.

Although it can deliver immense destructive power, the bullets are susceptible to air resistance and their power significantly declines depending on distance, making it impossible to deliver fatal damage at long distances. The great destructive power brings along large recoil and thus lowers the accuracy.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The powered-up Slugger NN2. Its performance has finally reached stable status. It can keep the destructive power while enhancing the accuracy. In order to make flexible use of accuracy, it's equipped with a laser sight. The convenience in usage exceeds Slugger NN2.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An upgraded version of the T3 Stork. It's redesigned into a rapid-fire rifle, making it more stable in performance. The accuracy is also improved and it's equipped with a laser sight.

The speed reduction due to air resistance is solved to some extent and make it a very powerful weapon.

Pulling the trigger (pressing the attack button) will consecutively fire three shots.

The enhanced Minion Buster. Its destructive power is greatly improved. In order to avoid hurting its user, the explosion countdown is set to be longer.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stagesâ€”hitting the target and the explosion that follows.

The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damages. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

A special gun developed using Raven assault rifle as a model sample. It rapidly shoots out lightweight bullets like needles. Since the bullets are smaller, the destructive power is less serious; but they can penetrate objects and attack multiple enemies with a single shot. In addition, because the bullets are downsized, the magazine capacity is enhanced, which lead to a better battle continuation ability.

Lightweight bullets are more susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance. Therefore, it performs best with immense destructive power at close range.

A new type of G&M semi-auto rifle. The bullets are changed to the initial type, so they don't have the penetrating power, but possess excellent destructive power.

Since the bullets are somewhat unique, the rifle is designed semi-auto.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

An upgraded version of Slugger NN3. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope, it's a rifle easier to use.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A large-caliber Minion Buster, which can fire super-large armor-piercing high explosive shells. The AP shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stagesâ€”hitting the target and the explosion that follows.

The mechanism is designed semi-auto to fire these super-large bullets. It fires a single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed).

The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful.

The next-generation high-performance Stork assault rifle. Its mechanism is thoroughly changed, successfully improves the overall performance. It's an excellent assault rifle without faults. Equipped with a laser sight.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A weapon developed from the M2 Raven. It successfully solves the problem of power decline by air resistance. In order to make a good use of the rapid-fire performance, the magazines are further improved to contain more ammos. However, reloading takes some time because of the magazine's size.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

An enhanced weapon developed from the Slugger. It's a prototype based on Slugger's mechanism, but it has a long shooting range.
Similar to Slugger, its power declines with air resistance; however, because its range of fire is long, it is still effective against enemies at mid-range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The powered-up T4 Stork. The bullets are changed to special AP bullets. They can pierce targets and cause damages to multiple enemies. A laser sight is attached.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The new Slugger assault rifle. Following the consistent designing idea, its range and accuracy are sacrificed in exchange for a greater destructive power.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A weapon developed from the M3 Raven. ROF is dramatically improved, but it's unstable and the accuracy isn't satisfying. Some see this as a failure.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The new version of the G&M semi-auto rifle. The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit. Besides, the large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

An upgraded version of the T4 Stork with various performances improved. It takes less time to load the bullets and there's a laser sight attached.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The powered-up X400-Orchid with improved accuracy and destructive power. Equipped with a scope. Although its power decreases due to air resistance, it can still deliver powerful damage at mid-range.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The powered-up M3 Raven. Its loading mechanism has been improved and equipped with a laser sight and a scope.

Since there were problems found in M4's design, they kept renovating the stable M3 Raven, and came out with this product that exceeds M4 in overall performances.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The finished version of the Stork assault rifle. All performances are upgraded to the limit. Equipped with a scope.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The ultimate Minion Buster. Not only the range is longer, its destructive power also becomes a lot more powerful. In order to avoid hurting its user, the explosion countdown is set to be longer. Equipped with a laser sight.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will consecutively fire armor-piercing high explosive shells.

The APHE shells are equipped with explosives and delayed detonators. They pierce the targeted armor and explode inside. It is a formidable weapon that deals damage in two stagesâ€”hitting the target and the explosion that follows.

The large shells result in slow speed and short range, but can cause devastating damages. The explosion power doesn't reduce with distance, so it's very effective even for enemies in long range.

The final model of the G&M semi-auto rifle. The special AP bullets have enough power to penetrate objects and deal damage to multiple enemies they hit. The large bullets fired are less susceptible to air resistance and thus remain powerful. It can still deliver fatal damage at long distances.

Due to the uniqueness of the bullets, this weapon is designed semi-auto.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

An improved weapon developed from the M4 Raven. This ultimate Raven assault rifle is a re-design based on the M4 model.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

The final model of Stork semi-auto rifle. All performances are pushed to the limit. Although it was developed as a trump card to turn the tide, it's difficult to mass-produce, so only a few prototypes are given to the elite soldiers. Equipped with a laser sight and a scope.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
Fired bullets are susceptible to air resistance and decrease in power depending on distance.

A pump-action style shotgun. It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their power significantly declines depending on distance. It is difficult to deliver fatal damage at long distances. It also takes some time to load the bullets.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

A semi-auto shotgun.

It fires one single shot each time the trigger is pulled (the attack button is pressed). To fire continuously, you must constantly pull the trigger (press the attack button), but with enough practice, it's possible to rapid-fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

NOTE: A blue Hit effect is displayed when penetrating.

An upgraded version of the Slaughter E20. Rounds are concentrated in a small area, making it possible to deal terrifying damage to a single target. Equipped with a laser sight, you can fight while checking the range of fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

NOTE: A blue Hit effect is displayed when penetrating.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.

A full-auto shotgun. Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots. It has immense destructive power at close range regardless who the user is.

This weapon emphasizes on its convenience and sacrifices some performance of the rapid-fire, but its stability and accuracy are thus improved.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

NOTE: A blue Hit effect is displayed when penetrating.

A new model of the Slaughter. Since the E20 LS model made its bullets concentrated in a smaller area, its hit rate has decreased. As a resault, the Slaughter E21 LS is developed with the expectation to be both wide-ranged and powerful. Not only its scattering range and attack power are improved, its discharge capacity also increases, making it possible to shoot in a distance and strike massive enemies. 

Equipped with a laser sight, you can fight while checking the range of fire.

It can simultaneously fire a large number of bullets. Since bullets scatter and fly about, it is possible to attack a wide range. It has immense destructive power at close range, and enough force to pierce its target. However, since the shape of its bullets are unique, they are susceptible to air resistance and their firepower significantly declines depending on distance, so does its penetrating power.

NOTE: A blue Hit effect is displayed when penetrating.

Holding the trigger (pressing and holding the attack button) will continually fire shots.
